MonsterTrait.Name: Amphibious
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon can breathe air and water.

MonsterTrait.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

MonsterTrait.Name: Siege Monster
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) cold damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Tail
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Frightful Presence
MonsterTrait.Text: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

MonsterTrait.Name: Tidal Breath (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon exhales a crushing wave of frigid seawater in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage and 33 (6d10) cold damage, and is pushed 30 feet away from the dragon and knocked prone. On a successful save the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

MonsterTrait.Name: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below
MonsterTrait.Text: Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

MonsterTrait.Name: Detect
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

MonsterTrait.Name: Tail Attack
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon makes a tail attack.

MonsterTrait.Name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
MonsterTrait.Text: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then move up to half its flying speed, or half its swim speed if in the water.
